entities.name: elphias doge
entities.description: Elphias Doge is mentioned as Special Advisor to the Wizengamot and a longstanding friend of Albus Dumbledore's. He made recent remarks about Skeeter's book being inaccurate.

entities.name: skeeter
entities.description: Skeeter is mentioned as an author who wrote a book about Dumbledore. She throws back her head and laughs at Elphias Doge's accusations.

entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: Albus Dumbledore is mentioned as the subject of Skeeter's book. He is also referred to in relation to his friend Elphias Doge.

entities.name: lake windermere
entities.description: Lake Windermere is mentioned as a location where Skeeter interviewed Elphias Doge about merpeople rights.

relationships.description: Elphias Doge accused Skeeter's book of being inaccurate.
Skeeter interviewed Elphias Doge at the bottom of Lake Windermere.
